title: How to send a saved voice clip as a message voice clip on WhatsApp - Quora

response.answer_text: Press the attachment button(paperclip). Select Audio which you want to send ORPress the paper clip button Select documents Choose the audio file which you want to send. You may have to have to go to the recording folder.
You can select the attachment icon and select the audio option and the file to send it. Even you can send it via the document option, whereas it will not reach as directly playable audio.
